name: Granny Horror Mansion
description:
One night, you and your friend branny decided to come inside the most famous horror house in the town. You want to make some videos about the paranormal activities in the mansion.

But, something isn't right.... There is something evil there. Ghost starting to appear suddenly, and you need to get out from granny's house.

In order to get out you need to collect hidden clues there. Are you brave enough?
